data.description:
Welcome to Astro Chef, the ultimate cosmic culinary voyage! Prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey, where cooking meets adventure across the stars. In Astro Chef, you'll:

- Embark on a Culinary Adventure: Transform into a master chef of the cosmos, serving up a variety of dishes to diverse alien patrons with their own distinct preferences, all while navigating the challenges of an intergalactic kitchen.
- Single Player & Co-op Gameplay: Choose your path, whether to single-handedly restore your Uncle's restaurant to its former glory or team up with a friend in a dynamic co-op mode. In co-op, one player dons the VR headset while the other assists with the Intergalactic Cookbook, available at www.astrochef-game.com, making teamwork and communication key to your success.
- Explore, Experiment, and Excel: With an array of alien ingredients at your disposal, discover the perfect combinations to delight your customers. Utilize unique, otherworldly kitchen tools to craft dishes that are as delightful to look at as they are to serve.
- Immerse Yourself in Stunning Visuals: Enjoy a game world brimming with vibrant art, detailed environments, and a cast of charming alien customers. 
- Face Fun & Challenging Progression: As you progress through themed chapters, the complexity of dishes increases, testing your culinary skills and adaptability. With each stellar rating, you're one step closer to becoming the ultimate Astro Chef.

changelog.change_log:
Welcome Astro Chefs! 
 We are over the moon with excitement at players finally getting their hands on the game. 
 While the game was making its way to you, we have already been working on various improvements to make the play experience even better! 
 In our first full patch for the game, you will find the following changes: 
 
 

Gastron has cleaned up the Dish Dressing area and installed a new Dish Dressing Item Dispenser! (where does he keep finding these machines?) This should make for a smoother and cleaner experience when dressing your dishes. 
 
  Spaceships (and debris) now appear behind the restaurant window. Word of the restaurantâ€™s grand re-opening must have attracted some attention! 
 
 Updated a few of the dishes to resolve issues with ingredient requirements and/or improve the plating experience. 
 
 Added/improved various VFX. Including for the Nuclear Press, Jet Stove, respawning items & pouring liquids. 
 
 Improved Audio & various SFX throughout the game 
 
 Fixed various minor bugs & visual issues throughout the game. 
 
 Increased version number of the game to 1.0.3
